desc: This proceedings volume brings together peer-reviewed papers presented at the International Conference on Information Technology and Computer Application Engineering, held 10-11 December 2014, in Hong Kong, China. Specific topics under consideration include Computational Intelligence, Computer Science and its Applications, Intelligent Information Processing and Knowledge Engineering, Intelligent Networks and Instruments, Multimedia Signal Processing and Analysis, Intelligent Computer-Aided Design Systems and other related topics.

details.authors: Hsiang-Chuan Liu, Wen-Pei Sung, Wenli Yao

title: Information, Computer and Application Engineering: Proceedings of the International Conference on Information Technology and Computer Application … 2014), Hong Kong, China, 10-11 December 2014
